attributes.action: School Start 9:30am and No school on Mondays
attributes.additional_details: working at school for 5 days and 2 days off is not fair children need more rest from working plus children have homework so Monday should be another rest day and go back on Tuesday
attributes.background: School should start Much later not earlier, not at 8:45am. It should start at 9:30am so children ain’t tired when getting up for school and when we arrived to school. Getting up earlier could mean lack of energy and progress in work when starting at 9:30 children will be less tired
